entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:49 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 01:34 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -29.9°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -32.9°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
